role_buckets: Software Engineer / Software Development Engineer (SWE / SDE)
AI / ML / Generative AI / LLM Engineer

experience_points: Developed a multi-tenant SaaS "super app" for small businesses using Next.js, React and Django REST APIs.
Implemented Python backend services with Django and Flask to power portals, simulations and internal tools.
Designed relational schemas in PostgreSQL and Amazon Aurora to support multi-tenant data isolation.
Containerized backend services with Docker and deployed them on AWS ECS for reliable, scalable hosting.
Configured an AWS Application Load Balancer to route traffic for 5 different customer domains from a single codebase.
Set up CI/CD pipelines with AWS CodeBuild and CodePipeline to automate build, test and deployment.
Hosted static marketing and portal assets on Amazon S3 to reduce server load and simplify deployments.
Implemented domain-isolated RAG and agentic AI flows using OpenAI, Hugging Face, LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI and PydanticAI so each tenant only queried its own document set.
Experimented with multiple LLM runtimes and providers, including Ollama, Google AI SDKs/APIs, PyTorch and TensorFlow, to benchmark model quality, latency and cost for production use.
Applied prompt engineering best practices and built reusable Python utilities to standardize prompts and evaluate LLM responses.
Automated onboarding and document workflows in n8n using webhooks and integrations with backend services.
Orchestrated end-to-end AI workflows with n8n, connecting RAG pipelines, external tools and APIs into automated agentic flows.
Maintained a simulation-heavy SaaS stack with a React frontend and Flask backend during commercialization, and built internal analysis tools in React, Streamlit and Flutter for domain experts.
Planned and executed migration paths from Flask with MongoDB to Django with PostgreSQL to standardize the backend.
Scripted AWS provisioning with Boto3 to manage EC2 instances, target groups and ALB rules as code.
Prototyped a Graph RAG pipeline in Neo4j to model entities and relationships for multi-hop question answering.
Implemented a BLE and WebSocket bridge between an Android app and a Windows robotic eye controller for real-time control.
Worked daily in Linux-based development and server environments for debugging and deployment.
Maintained SOC 2–aligned security for the SaaS platform by tightening access control and audit logging across AWS and application services.
Built Dell Boomi processes to sync core Salesforce and NetSuite data so CRM and finance stayed aligned.
Configured Boomi workflows for Okta user provisioning, updates and offboarding to automate user lifecycle management.
Created reusable Boomi process templates from recurring integration patterns to speed up new integrations.
Helped orchestrate data pipelines with Apache Airflow to schedule and monitor recurring data jobs.
Wrote SQL transformations in Snowflake to prepare clean datasets for analytics and reporting.
Built an internal Node.js, Express and EJS web app so the team could view integration status and logs in one place.
Founded Confegure Techsols to deliver custom web, mobile and IoT software for small businesses and startups, operating it for 4 years.
Served 15+ clients and delivered 5+ custom software products from initial idea to production.
Built full-stack web apps for clients using React with Node.js and Express.
Built client dashboards and admin portals using React, Vite, Angular, HTML/CSS and JavaScript, backed by Node.js / Express.js and Java / Spring Boot APIs.
Developed additional backends in Django and Spring Boot when projects required those ecosystems.
Designed data models with PostgreSQL, MySQL and MongoDB to match each project's requirements.
Developed cross-platform mobile apps in Flutter to ship Android and iOS clients from a single codebase.
Implemented native Android features in Java and integrated them with Flutter apps when platform APIs were needed.
Shipped React Native apps for clients who preferred a JavaScript-based mobile stack.
Implemented an ESP32-based smart switch system using MQTT and a Flutter app to turn legacy switchboards into smart devices.
Deployed client projects on AWS EC2 with S3 and simple CI/CD scripts for reliable hosting and updates.
Created UI wireframes and interactive prototypes in Figma and Adobe XD to validate flows with clients.
Reviewed code and mentored junior developers and interns to maintain quality and share best practices.
Scoped projects, estimated effort and managed client communication from kickoff through delivery.
Launched Tic Trac, a movie ticket tracking app built with Flutter and Node.js, reaching 20,000+ downloads and tracking bookings across 1,000+ cities and 6,000+ screens.
Built Udhyogulu, an employee-focused news app, which achieved 15,000 downloads in a single day after launch.
Developed the Confegure startup website, which attracted 1,000+ visits and generated 10+ inbound leads in its first week.
Created the Red and Blue Appliance Repair website, whose SEO-optimized design helped generate 100+ leads in the first week after launch.
Released Reach Alert, a location-based alarm app, which achieved 2,000+ downloads with 100+ installs in the first month.
Built Lock Down Mart, a local-store e-commerce and virtual queue app recognized by the IT Ministry of Telangana and featured in a magazine.

profile.name: Sumanth Bejugam
profile.summary: Full Stack Software Developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web, mobile and IoT applications using Flutter, React, Node.js and Python. Proven track record of delivering production-ready solutions under tight deadlines, with tens of thousands of app downloads, enterprise usage and government-recognized projects. Founder of a tech startup and winner of multiple hackathons. Skilled in AWS-based cloud architectures, CI/CD, LLM/RAG integrations and BLE-based IoT systems. Known for rapid learning, clean architecture and cross-platform execution.

education.notes: Graduate coursework and projects in software engineering, AI/ML and distributed systems.
Specialization in Artificial Intelligence with projects in ML, DL and NLP.

projects.name: Small Business Services Super App (SaaS)
projects.summary: Multi-tenant SaaS web app that lets small business owners access bookkeeping, tax, company formation, marketing and expert consultation services from a single portal.
highlights: Designed and built the application end to end as the sole full stack developer.
Implemented multi-tenant data isolation using PostgreSQL and Amazon Aurora.
Integrated a domain-isolated RAG chatbot so each customer instance only answers from its own documents.
Automated onboarding and document workflows with n8n, reducing manual steps for internal teams.
Deployed the system on AWS ECS behind an Application Load Balancer with CI/CD via CodeBuild and CodePipeline.

projects.name: Simulation SaaS Platform Modernization
projects.summary: Commercialization of a simulation-heavy SaaS platform by stabilizing the existing stack and planning a migration from Flask + MongoDB to Django + PostgreSQL on AWS.
highlights: Maintained a React + Flask + MongoDB stack during early customer onboarding.
Helped design migration paths from MongoDB to PostgreSQL to standardize storage.
Used Boto3 to script provisioning of EC2 instances, target groups and ALB rules for multiple customer domains.

projects.name: Tic Trac – Movie Ticket Booking Tracker
projects.summary: Android and Flutter-based app that tracks movie ticket bookings and alerts users as soon as bookings open for selected movies, theatres and dates.
highlights: Reached 20,000+ downloads with high engagement from movie-goers.
Tracked bookings for 6,000+ screens across 1,000+ cities.
Implemented background tracking so users receive alerts even when the app is closed.
Supported phone-number login for 200+ country codes to serve international users.

projects.name: Lock Down Mart – Local Store E-commerce & Queueing
projects.summary: Pair of Android apps that let local grocery stores sell online and manage virtual queues so customers can shop safely during COVID-19 lockdowns.
highlights: Implemented store owner and customer apps with real-time order tracking.
Used Google Maps for user and store locations to plan pickups and deliveries.
Recognized by the IT Ministry of Telangana and featured in a local magazine.

projects.name: Reach Alert – Location-Based Alarm App
projects.summary: Android alarm app that triggers when a user enters a configured radius around a chosen location instead of at a specific time.
highlights: Reached 2,000+ downloads with 100+ installs in the first month.
Implemented background location tracking so alerts fire even when the app is closed.
Allowed users to configure radius-based alerts between 500m and 5km.

projects.name: Oil Seed and Pests Hub
projects.summary: Web application for the Telangana State Government Oil Seed and Pests Research Organization to store and view detailed oil seed and pest data.
highlights: Implemented secure modules for uploading and viewing oil seed and pest information.
Designed a responsive UI so researchers can access data from any device.
Received appraisal and a certificate from TSIIOR for the project.

projects.name: Confegure Website
projects.summary: Portfolio website for Confegure Techsols to showcase services, projects and contact options.
highlights: Attracted 1,000+ visits and generated 10+ inbound leads in the first week after launch.
Implemented seamless UX with FAQs, social media integration and analytics tracking.
Migrated the site from Flutter to React for improved maintainability.

projects.name: Red and Blue Appliance Repair Website
projects.summary: Responsive marketing website for an appliance repair company with a clear services listing and contact form.
highlights: Generated 100+ leads in the first week after launch through SEO-focused content and structure.
Designed the UI and UX from wireframes to final implementation.
Integrated a third-party contact form solution for quick customer inquiries.

projects.name: Bright Star Non Medical Transport Service Website
projects.summary: Responsive website for an ambulance and non-medical transport service provider.
highlights: Showcased all transport services with clear CTAs for booking and inquiries.
Designed the UX and UI to work well on both desktop and mobile devices.
Collaborated with a team of 5 to deliver the site end to end.

projects.name: Intelli Switch – ESP32 Smart Switch Module
projects.summary: ESP32-based module and mobile app that convert existing switchboards into smart switches controllable over the internet.
highlights: Designed the firmware, MQTT protocol and mobile app for safe, cost-effective home automation.
Built a Flutter app to control switches remotely and manage schedules.
Implemented a Node.js backend with MongoDB and Firebase Auth for device and user management.

projects.name: Laptop Tracking / Localization Module
projects.summary: Python module that estimates laptop location inside a building using Wi-Fi signal strengths.
highlights: Achieved location estimates with a minimal error of around 5 meters.
Designed the data collection protocol and performed multiple rounds of data gathering.
Explored different ML methods and feature selection approaches to improve accuracy.
Received an A grade for the project.

certifications.name: The Digital Marketing Revolution
certifications.issuer: Coursera - University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

certifications.name: CISSP – Certified Information Systems Security Professional (Training)

achievements.description: Launched and scaled a movie ticket tracking app that crossed 20,000+ downloads.

achievements.title: Winner – University Hackathon
achievements.description: Won a university-level hackathon for a software project.

achievements.title: Winner – Inter-University Hackathon
achievements.description: Won an inter-university hackathon competing against teams from multiple colleges.
